Zabier CLI
======

# Description

A CLI tool to automate Zabbix configurations.

# Requirements

- Python 3.7 or higher

# Supported versions of Zabbix Server 

- 3.0 LTS

# Installation

```sh
python setup.py install
```

```sh
pip install zabier-cli
```

# Upgrade

```sh
pip install zabier-cli --upgrade
```

# Usage

```sh
zabier --help
```
